snippet: The local community board in Manhattan has asked New York’s Landmarks Preservation Commission to give landmark status to the Rose Reading Room inside the New York Public Library’s flagship branch on Fifth Avenue.
abstract: The local community board in Manhattan has asked New York’s Landmarks Preservation Commission to give landmark status to the Rose Reading Room inside the New York Public Library’s flagship branch on Fifth Avenue.

headline.main: Landmark Status Sought for Public Library's Rose Reading Room
headline.print_headline: Effort to Protect Rose Reading Room
